plugins.name: html-visual
plugins.description: Generates interactive HTML visualizations — UI mockups, ERDs, flowcharts, charts, slides, architecture diagrams, dashboards, timelines, mindmaps, kanban boards, tables, wireframes. Use when the user asks to visualize, mock up, diagram, chart, create ERD, generate slides, architecture diagram, dashboard, timeline, mindmap, kanban, table, wireframe, or interactive HTML.

plugins.name: ralph-loop-template
plugins.description: Generates iterable checklist PROMPT files for Ralph Loop from plan files or current context, and provides the /ralph-loop execution command.
